questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry over the past 9.0 years?
How do you believe your personal reasons for a 1.5-year employment gap have influenced your professional growth and development?
What specific skills and expertise do you bring to the table from your time in the Information Technology industry?
How have you stayed up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the IT field during your career?
Can you share a specific project or accomplishment from your work history that you are particularly proud of?
How do you approach problem-solving and decision-making in high-pressure situations within the IT industry?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in order to meet project deadlines?
Have you had experience working on cross-functional teams, and if so, how do you ensure effective communication and collaboration among team members?
How do you handle conflicts or disagreements with colleagues or supervisors in a professional setting?
How do you see yourself contributing to the success of a new team or organization in the Information Technology industry?
